### [Notice/avis] - No: [no] - Title/Titre: Safety Training Services [Formation à la Sécurité]

#### Announcement Information
* Reference number : WS4243121442-4432718251 
* Publication date : January 31, 2024 
* Closing date Time : March 15, 2024 14:00:00
* Procurement method: Competitive - Open bidding

#### Notice Type/Jointure de Type

This is a [Request for Standing Offer/Demande d'offre à commandes] public notice inviting qualified bidders [ enchantillonurs qualifies à soumissionner] to submit a proposal under the Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement and North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA).

The contract will be awarded on the basis of [Lowest price/Prix le plus bas]

#### Contract Details
* Procurement category: SRV (Services)
* Services to be provided :
  + Ergonomics Coach training (formation des formateurs en ergonomie)
  + Fall Arrest Train the Trainer Course (figure 1 cours de formation des formateurs relativement à l’espace clos)
* Delivery location: Oromocto, New Brunswick
* Statement of requirement: The contractor will deliver training at 5e Division Support Group (5 CDSG) Gagetown, Oromocto, New Brunswick. This will equip 5 CDSG personnel with the requisite knowledge and training to meet security requirements. 

### Important Web Links
To access more information on this tender on the Supply & Practice Canada [Precision et Approvisionnement/Canda – Buyandsell.gc/c] Website, please click on [urls].
